q_en: What materials were used in Olivia's order?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Olivia';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "Olivia"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = '7';
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for orders placed by the customer "Olivia"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM order_product WHERE order_id IN (7);
steps.description: Retrieve the order product IDs for the orders placed by "Olivia"

steps.sql: SELECT product_id FROM order_product WHERE id IN (25, 26, 27);
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs for the order products associated with "Olivia's" orders

steps.sql: SELECT material_id, number FROM product_material WHERE product_id IN (18, 17, 10);
steps.description: Retrieve the material IDs and quantities used for the products in "Olivia's" orders

steps.sql: SELECT name FROM materials WHERE id IN (8, 12, 6, 4, 10, 2);
steps.description: Retrieve the material names for the material IDs used in "Olivia's" orders

response:
Sure thing! Let's take a look at the materials used in Olivia's order. Here's a breakdown of the materials and their quantities:

| Material Name            | Quantity Used |
|--------------------------|---------------|
| Fabric Pieces            | 3             |
| Wool Pieces              | 4             |
| Silk Pieces              | 6             |
| Leather Pieces           | 2             |
| Synthetic Fiber Pieces   | 4             |
| Denim Fabric Pieces      | 3             |

It looks like Olivia's order included a variety of materials! If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. üòä
